name: Training
description: The aim of practical training is to help students develop skills and abilities that support professional studies and prepare them for work later on.

name: Caring
description: caring helps us to strengthen our relationships and develop meaningful emotional connections with others

name: Monitoring
description: Monitoring is done to ensure that all the students who need to know about an intervention are properly informed, and so that decisions can be taken in a timely manner.

name: Teaching
description: Teaching is fundamentally about creating the pedagogical, social, and ethical conditions under which students agree to take charge of their own learning, individually and collectively.
